section.name: Release notes for community service 2008.1.02
section.p: These are differences between version 2008.1.02 and 2008.1.01.

subsection.name: All-users mailing list
subsection.p: The menu on all pages of the web application has a new entry: "list of email addresses". This feature allows administrators to get a list of addresses for all members of the community. The list is only accessible to a user with the administrator password.

subsection.name: Security facade updated
subsection.p: This community release uses the latest security facade to take advantage of fixes in that component.
